pros: Fun at high speeds; Smooth ride; Pleasantly lightweight; Good stability; Plush padding; Accommodating toebox; Excellent lockdown; Grippy outsole; Comfortable for walking; Sustainable and stylish design
cons: Too firm for longer runs; Average at best breathability; Upper durability could be better
RR_verdict: The Cloudgo from On Running is a daily trainer that's ready to shift gears when we want to take it easy or go faster on the road. It's light, responsive, and smooth-rolling; getting to our next stride isn't a task. And if you want something that's environmentally friendly, the On Cloudgo boasts sustainability and good looks.
awards: Top pick in best On running shoes (2023), Top pick in best On road running shoes (2023), Top 16% in road running shoes, Top 11% in On running shoes
